abstract: Clarence Edgar Goodson IV (born May 17, 1982) is an American professional soccer player who currently plays defender for San Jose Earthquakes in Major League Soccer. The Earthquakes had previously owned the rights to Goodson following the 2007 MLS Expansion Draft.
